jd_information.description: 1. Helping Individuals Who are wanting who are interested in going abroad by attending to customer walkins / emailers / tele etc etc to reallocate Internationally2.The Immigration Consultant must interview all clients and ensure that the client is suitable for the process 3. Providing counseling and customer service to the prospects/clients over phone or in person 4. It will be the in-house profile5. Calling prospective clients and making follow ups on daily basis6. Responsible for meeting monthly sales targets by converting warm leads and enquiries to prospects clients7.
